title: Tile Floor Throughout, Controlled Access, Guest Parking Available
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1230 Sq.
Conveniently located off of Galveston Road-Houston Boulevard and minutes away from Houston's best dining, shopping and entertainment, the Quay Point Apartments have it all!
Quay Point is best known for its beautiful landscaping and spacious one bedroom, two bedroom and studio apartments.
Outside, we invite you to float in the sparkling pool, take the kids to the playground or relax on your own private balcony.
Our friendly and knowledgeable staff is more than happy to assist with all of your needs.
Send us an email anytime and receive a timely response to any question you might have.
There is so much that the Quay Point community has to offer you.
So come experience all of the reasons why you should make Quay Point your new home today!
Air Conditioning, Private Balconies/Patios, Vertical Blinds, Full Size Washer/Dryer Connections, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal, Tile Floor Throughout, Ceiling Fan, Mini-Blinds
On-Site Laundry Facilities, On-Site Maintenance, Off-Street Resident Parking, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, Swimming Pool, Clubhouse, Controlled Access, Guest Parking Available, Playground
